ComicInfo.Title: Run for Cover!
ComicInfo.Summary: Run for Cover!: The Pirate Planet vs the Colonizer fleet. The pirate ships and crews which escape decide to abandon Haven and become Privateers, offering protection to worlds the Colonizers attack. Raader decides to 'protect' Earth, so off they go to find it.
